contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1899 D New Brighton Contest
New Brighton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
new-brighton-contest
None
Lohengrin [arr. Round]
New Brighton Tower, Cheshire 1st prize £30 and cup. 2nd prize £15. 3rd prize £10. 4th prize £5. Best cornet - John Paley (Black Dyke). Best euphonium - John Green (Nutgrove). 1st annual contest organised at New Brighton Tower. 17 bands entered, 8 bands competed.
April 15, 2012, 7:38 p.m. July 28, 2019, 2:39 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Band John Gladney Jnr
2 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr
3 Crooke William Rimmer
4 Workington Herbert Scott
Unknown Result Gossage Soap Works John James Brady
Unknown Result Rhodes Bleach Works John Henry White
Unknown Result Widnes Subscription William Rimmer
Unknown Result Nutgrove John Gladney Jnr
